tool_description: Validates RFP content against applicable government procurement regulations and policy requirements.

rfp_content.description: Draft RFP text content to be validated

procurement_type.description: Type of procurement (goods, services, construction, IT)

error_messages: Invalid jurisdiction: Must specify federal, state, or local jurisdiction.
Missing procurement details: Provide procurement_threshold and procurement_type.
Unsupported procurement type: Use goods, services, construction, or IT.
Invalid threshold: Procurement threshold must be a positive number.
Security classification error: Provide valid classification level.
usage: Submit draft RFP content with jurisdiction, threshold, and type information. Include optional parameters for small business requirements and trade agreements. Returns compliance assessment and required corrections.

applicable_regulations.description: List of applicable regulations and statutes
